revised_title: Observations on Insects and Their Reproduction
tldr: The author shares a letter from Mons. Trembley, who made observations on insects and their reproduction. Trembley discovered that these insects can regenerate lost body parts and reproduce asexually. He encourages others to try the experiments and provides directions on how to keep and feed the insects. The letter also mentions the possibility of sending some insects to the recipient for further study.
